name: Koord Coach for Meta / Oculus Quest
name_original: Koord Coach for Meta / Oculus Quest
description:
Hi everyone,

I'm an indie game dev and Koord Coach is the first game I ever published. I am still developing and improving it so any feedback is welcome.

With Koord Coach you can train your reflexes, cardio and coordination within one app / game. All events in the game happen randomly, ensuring that no two play sessions are the same, to make sure you stay on your toes.

Koord Coach has three different game modes, each with two or more sub-modes:

1. Block Incoming Objects - dodge or block game objects trying to hit you to score points.

2. Endurance - touch game objects which appear around you before they disappear to score points.

3.  Cube activation - touch game objects when they become active to score points.

Eight different difficulty levels and six game duration settings ranging from 30 seconds to five minutes allow you to tailor the game to your wishes.
